RelatedSentence: NEW DELHI : Sonia Gandhi and her son Rahul Monday offered to step down as leaders of India 's Congress party after it suffered its worst ever election defeat , but in a bid to snuff out dissent against the country 's leading political dynasty , party bosses declined .

Congress , which has ruled India for most of its 67 years of independence including the last decade , is reeling from a humiliating reverse to rival Narendra Modi and his Hindu nationalist Bharatiya Janata Party .

But rather than single out the Gandhis , who led a lacklustre campaign in the face of Modi 's barnstorming performance , Congress leaders facing at least five years in opposition rallied around the family .

But rather than single out the Gandhis , who led a lacklustre campaign in the face of Modi 's barnstorming performance , Congress leaders facing at least five years in opposition rallied around the family .

RelatedSentence: Sonia and Rahul offered to resign but the CWC rejected it unanimously , said Amrinder Singh , a senior party leader , referring to the elite Congress Working Committee which met at party headquarters in New Delhi .
